@action.description: Action type for interval tool call review.

decision.description: The decision for the tool execution. 'continue' means the tool should keep running, 'cancel' means the tool execution should be stopped.

reason.description: A brief explanation for the decision, explaining why you chose to continue or cancel.

progress_summary.description: A summary of what the tool has accomplished so far based on the output.

estimated_remaining_time.description: Your estimate of how much longer the tool might need to complete, if continuing.
